name: Google Analytics Agentü§ñ - Create and send Reportsüü¢

parameters.content: ## Get Report and Notify via email

parameters.text:
=Send email as a html; when you send the report to the admin


Present this report to the company admins for the performance of the website from the search console.

Key Metrics:
Overview of Key Metrics:

Total Events: Number of events triggered by users.

Total Users: Total count of individual users visiting the site.

Active Users:

1 Day Active Users

28 Day Active Users

User Engagement Duration: Total time users spent on the site.

Sessions: Total number of user sessions.

User Behavior Analysis:
Event Distribution: Graph or chart showing the number of events per day.

Session Duration: Average duration of each session.

Event-to-User Ratio: Average number of events per user.

Bounce Rate: Percentage of single-page sessions.

Geographical Insights:
Total Countries: Number of countries from which users visited.

Top Countries: Map or list of the top countries by user activity.

Regional Performance: User engagement and session duration by region.

Engagement Metrics:
High-Engagement Content: Pages with the highest user engagement.

Time on Page: Average time spent on each page.

User Flow: How users navigate through the site.

Conversion Metrics:
Conversion Rate: Percentage of users completing desired actions.

Funnel Analysis: Visualization of user journeys leading to conversions.

Traffic Sources:
Channels: Breakdown of traffic sources (e.g., organic search, direct, social media).

Campaign Performance: Analysis of marketing campaigns driving traffic and conversions.

Device and Technology Insights:
Device Usage: Distribution of users across desktop, mobile, and tablet.

Browser and OS Data: Popular browsers and operating systems used by visitors.

User Retention and Churn:
Retention Rate: Percentage of returning users.

Churn Analysis: Patterns leading to user drop-off.

Recommendations:
Content Optimization: Suggestions for improving high and low-performing pages.

User Retention Strategies: Tactics to increase returning visitors.

Marketing Focus: Recommendations for targeting top-performing regions or channels.

Additional Details and Context:
Analyze high-engagement content, user retention rates, and traffic sources.

Provide actionable recommendations based on the insights.

Refer to previous conversations to include any missed metrics or insights.

Data Source:
The data is from a subtool node for the different metrics we need.

options.systemMessage:
=You are a helpful assistant

Google Analytics Insights & Performance Report

Executive Summary

Overall Performance: We saw strong performance from direct traffic with high user engagement. Organic sources have potential for growth.

Traffic & Source Analysis

Traffic Source Total Users Engagement (Pages Viewed)
Direct 90 7
Organic 31 7
Referral 4 3
Paid 50 5

Key Recommendations

  • Improve SEO on high-traffic but underperforming pages.
  • Focus on improving conversion rates from organic traffic sources.
  • Optimize referral traffic by improving content alignment with user needs.

Opportunities for Growth

  • Target high-performing segments with personalized content to increase engagement.
  • Focus on organic traffic growth by optimizing landing pages and enhancing content relevance.

Schedule a Discussion

Thank you for reviewing the insights. For further details, feel free to reach out!
